HomePage.title: Dara Transilvania
HomePage.subtitle: Frozen Food Distribution
HomePage.aboutUsText: Dara Transilvania is a leader in frozen food distribution in Romania. We offer a wide range of meat, vegetables and semi-prepared products for the HoReCa sector.

categoryDescriptions.Legume: Spinach, peas, beans, cauliflower, broccoli and other mixtures.
categoryDescriptions.Conserve: Black olives, beetroot, pickles, roasted capia peppers.
categoryDescriptions.Condimente: Oregano, garlic, black pepper, sweet paprika.
